result.arabic_text: وَقَالُواْ نَحۡنُ أَكۡثَرُ أَمۡوَٰلٗا وَأَوۡلَٰدٗا وَمَا نَحۡنُ بِمُعَذَّبِينَ
result.translation: (35) And they[1235] said, "We are more [than the believers] in wealth and children, and we are not to be punished."
result.footnotes: [1235]- The affluent ones in general or the people of Makkah specifically.
